name: Do You Know "The Last Five Years"? Quiz | Humanities | 10 Questions

questions.text: We all know that Norbert Leo Butz played Jamie and Sherie Rene Scott played Cathy, but who played Cathy before the show came to Off-Broadway?
questions.explanation:
Lauren Kennedy.

	Lauren Kennedy later released a CD devoted solely to Jason Robert Brown's songs, called "Songs of Jason Robert Brown". It featured three songs from the musical "The Last Five Years".

questions.text: Where is Cathy when she sings "See I'm Smiling"?
questions.explanation:
A pier.

	"I guess I can't believe you really came,And that we're sitting on this pier.See, I'm smiling.That means I'm happy that you're here."

questions.text: At what point in the show are Cathy and Jamie at the same point in time?
options: I Can Do Better Than That
questions.explanation:
The Next Ten Minutes.

	In "The Next Ten Minutes", Jame and Cathy are in a boat near the Dakota. Jamie proposes and Cathy accepts. They are both blissfully happy, for now.

False.

	Jamie cheats on Cathy while she is away in Ohio. His mistress' name is Elise, and he sings to her and to himself in the song "Nobody Needs to Know".

questions.text: Jamie may be using hyperbole, but how far is he from his mother's heart in the song "Shiksa Goddess"?
questions.explanation:
Ninety miles.

	"I'm breaking my mother's heartThe longer I stand looking at youThe more I hear it splinter and crackFrom ninety miles away". Jamie's elated that Cathy isn't Jewish, and he sings about it in the song "Shiksa Goddess".

questions.text: When Jamie begins to daydream, what does he eat a lot of?
questions.explanation:
Doritos.

	When he goes off to "Jamie-Land", he eats handfuls of Doritos. This erratic behavior makes Cathy feel a little alienated, but she's still married to the man she loves. She is "A Part of That".

questions.text: According to Cathy, who plays Tevye and Porgy in Ohio?
questions.explanation:
Carl.

	Carl is a gay midget who acts with Cathy in Ohio. Another interesting member of the company is Cathy's unnamed roomate. She is a former stripper and has a snake named Wayne.

questions.text: What publishing house is keeping Jamie on the phone and in his office?
questions.explanation:
Random House.

	"I'll be there ripe and crawling If darned Random House stops calling..." Of course, those of you who know this lyric will notice that I've chosen to omit Jamie's cursing in this verse.

questions.text: Schmuel the tailor lived in the small town of Klimovitch
questions.explanation:
True.

	A magic clock gave old Schmuel the gift of time. Jamie tells Cathy this story at Christmas, just before he gives her a watch, his own gift of eternal time to do the things she wants. He encourages her to go out and live her dream of being an actress.

questions.text: Finally, how many children do Jamie and Cathy have?
options: One adopted child and one biological
questions.explanation:
None.

	Throughout the show, Jamie and Cathy remain a childless couple. It is probably for the best, as divorces can be especially hard on children.
